content:
PHASE 2 COMPLETE

All five entropy engine tasks completed successfully.

TASK RESULTS:
- 2-1 (coherence): TF-IDF, clustering, CoherenceSnapshot with 49 tests
- 2-2 (engine): IntegrationCostEngine computing all 4 cost components
- 2-3 (calibration): ThresholdCalibrator with Welfords algorithm, 22 tests
- 2-4 (propagation): PropagationQueue and async worker, 17 tests
- 2-5 (integration): WRITE/REVISE endpoints now return real integration_cost

FILES CREATED (Phase 2):
- crates/notebook-entropy/src/{tfidf.rs, clustering.rs, coherence.rs}
- crates/notebook-entropy/src/{engine.rs, calibration.rs, propagation.rs}

TOTAL RUST FILES: 30
TOTAL TESTS: 88+ new tests in notebook-entropy

KEY CAPABILITIES:
- Topic clustering via TF-IDF similarity
- Reference density tracking
- Integration cost computation (entries_revised, references_broken, catalog_shift, orphan)
- Adaptive orphan threshold calibration
- Background cost propagation
- X-Integration-Cost-Computed header for observability

FIXES APPLIED:
- crypto.rs Signature::from_bytes (ed25519-dalek v2 API)
- store.rs query_entries lifetime fix

NOTEBOOK STATE:
- Total entries: 61
- Notebook entropy: 32.5

NEXT: Phase 3 - BROWSE and Catalog (dense summaries with entropy annotations)
author: orchestrator
